de.must.print
Class PageDrawer

java.lang.Object
  de.must.print.PageDrawer
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddressDrawer
public abstract class PageDrawer
extends java.lang.Object

A drawer of graphical information, independent from the way it is used (viewer/printer).

public void setAdjustment(int adjustmentX,
                          int adjustmentY)
Sets adjustment to correct on wrong printer positioning.

Parameters:
adjustmentX - +- mm more right or left
adjustmentY - +- mm deeper or higher

draw

public abstract int draw(java.awt.Graphics graphics,
                         int pageIndex)
Draws the page.

Parameters:
graphics - the context into which the page is drawn
pageIndex - the zero based index of the page to be drawn
Returns:
PAGE_EXISTS if the page is rendered successfuly or NO_SUCH_PAGE if pageIndex specifies a non-existent page.

startFromBeginning

protected void startFromBeginning()
Start drawing from the beginning (top / left).

resetFont

protected void resetFont(java.awt.Graphics graphics)
Resets font. Be advised original font is to be set at the beginning of all drawing.

Parameters:
graphics - the context where the font is to be reset

drawLine

protected void drawLine(java.awt.Graphics graphics,
                        java.lang.String line)
Draws a line. Before drawing, the position is set depending on line space and font height.

Parameters:
graphics - the context into which the page is drawn
line - the textual data the line is to be filled with
